verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Bwana unayoyatenda kwangu mimi
ni huruma ya kweli (ya kweli)
sitakuwa na fadhila
nisipokiri haya). x2
(Kuniumba, bila ya kukwambia,
Akili yangu tofauti sana
Ninalala pia ninaamka
tazama niko hai). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Uhai nilio nao, sijanunua lolote,
Bwana nashukuru sana
ninasema asante.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Marafiki umenipa,
maisha ya kupendeza,
Bwana nashukuru sana
ninasema asante.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Umenipa na watoto,
yote sikutarajia,
Bwana nashukuru sana
ninasema asante.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Yote umetenda kwangu,
bila mimi kuwa mwema.
Bwana nashukuru sana
ninasema asante.
